snippet: Consisting of 33 Picassos, 17 Braques, 14 Légers and 14 works by Gris, the Leonard A. Lauder Cubist Collection has been promised to the Metropolitan Museum of Art. In this feature, Emily Braun, the curator of the collection, discusses highlights.
lead_paragraph: Consisting of 33 Picassos, 17 Braques, 14 Légers and 14 works by Gris, the Leonard A. Lauder Cubist Collection has been promised to the Metropolitan Museum of Art. In this feature, Emily Braun, the curator of the collection, discusses highlights.

headline.seo: Leonard A. Lauder Cubist Collection in Audio and Images
